card.text: When Thern, Le Nain Le Plus Moche enters the battlefield Draw two card, then discard a card T: Create a Treasure Token

card.name: The Black Baron
card.text: Vigilance, Menace BB, T, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target creature. WW, T: Create a 1/1 white soldier creature token.

card.name: Opportunity Attack
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 When enchanter creature blocks, it gains first strike until the end of turn
